subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Asdrubal Cabrera hit a three-run homer and David Huff pitched seven scoreless innings Monday to lift the Indians to a 5-2 victory over the host Minnesota Twins in the first game of a doubleheader.
snippet: Asdrubal Cabrera hit a three-run homer and David Huff pitched seven scoreless innings Monday to lift the Indians to a 5-2 victory over the host Minnesota Twins in the first game of a doubleheader.
